javelin.controller.action

Class Wait

  • java.lang.Object
    • javelin.controller.action.Action
      • javelin.controller.action.Wait
  • All Implemented Interfaces:

    public class Wait
extends Action
implements AiAction
    Technically it's the action Full Defense because it gives a bonus to AC (see Defending but w is a better keyboard shortcut for it. Waiting is disabled by default, pending further testing. Initially the AI decided to wait all the time. The exceptin is when she is wut of AiMovement TODO
